plot outline: "Devang", a crime thriller in Gujarati, is a story of a Self-Righteous person called Devang. This is the story of his struggle to weed out the corrupt and negative elements in the society within the system. The film depicts how the governing system can be used in the positive as well as negative way, - the corrupt use it to manipulate the system for their personal gains, and the righteous ones use it for the betterment of the society. The film depicts both sides of the system - the good and bad elements in Politics and the Police system.
title: Devang
plot: "_Devang_ (qv)", a crime thriller in Gujarati, is a story of a Self-Righteous person called _Devang_ (qv). This is the story of his struggle to weed out the corrupt and negative elements in the society within the system. The film depicts how the governing system can be used in the positive as well as negative way, - the corrupt use it to manipulate the system for their personal gains, and the righteous ones use it for the betterment of the society. The film depicts both sides of the system - the good and bad elements in Politics and the Police system.::Deep Dhudiya
